short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the code in numbers and press Scan to trigger the scan event, instead of using a handheld

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A development productivity gadget to simulate scanning a barcode or QR code using a USB conncted scanner, but without actually having real scanner.
